name: Soul of War: Legions
description:
We fused card games and RTS together to make the best Auto Chess Game we could. choose your card combination from five different races to overcome your opponent



Deploy the legion you've nurtured during your preparation phase onto the battlefield, bringing to life a spectacle of thousand-strong forces clashing on screen, engaged in real-time combat with genuine physics effects.

Strategize to fit your playstyle

There are five races to choose from, each offering unique and surprising gameplay aspects. Select all the cards from your primary race. Throughout your competitive journey, you will have the ability to enhance your cards through a mix-and-match upgrade system, paving new paths to victory."

Immerse yourself in a gameplay where no two encounters are the same.

  • Every experience you embark on is unique.
  • Make use of over 80 cards complemented by 33 different artifacts to build your customized deck.
  • Interact with 5 diverse races, each offering a distinctly different tribal gameplay.
  • Each race provides an array of unique gameplay combinations.
  • Enjoy multiple gameplay modes: Tutorial stages, expedition mode, solo queue, and duo queue.

We kindly encourage you to try out this innovative gameplay. Admittedly, our first iteration may contain some imperfections. However, we are committed to continually refining and evolving based on our players' feedback. Your discussions, exchanges, and suggestions are greatly appreciated. Thank you!
